Portfolio:

Command V Ninja

Like Evernote (note-taking software) cloned in the browser and geared toward programmers. The back end integrates with a Sublime Text plugin for easily pasting your snippets of code, as well as with a Chrome extension for easily copying from the web.

Nightly Nachos

A work in progress! A nightly nacho curation site in real time. What this means is that users post their nachos, and other users comment with a funny picture of their face (preferably involving nachos). Built with Firebase so everything is done in real time.

SaySong

Another work in progress! This was built for a Spotify hackathon. The idea is that the application will play your words as you type!

About Me I'm a web developer who enjoys problem solving and meeting exciting people. I also like writing, Tai chi, and eating nachos. I am currently looking to join a team of engineers who get to solve cool problems. If you think I might be good candidate for a team you know about, or you would just like to talk about something that interests you, send me an email or a tweet!
